Title: Summary
Description: Proficient in developing and deploying  AI/ML models (PyTorch, tensorflow, Keras, sklearn and H2O) to  solve complex biological problems. Applied examples include:

Title: Causal variant effect prediction
Description: Used functional impact predictions from DNA sequence models (DeepSEA, Basenji, IMPACT) to validate SNPs prioritised with Bayesian fine-mapping.   [ @[file-text] ](https://doi.org/10.1093/hmg/ddab294)

Title: Foundation models
Description: Used transformer trained on >36M cells and protein sequence embeddings to uncover cell type-specific mechanisms of disease.

Title: LLM knowledge extraction
Description: Developed framework to extract quantitative metrics of phenotype severity from GPT-4. [ @[file-text] ](https://doi.org/10.1101/2024.06.10.24308475)

Title: Disease genomics embeddings
Description: Developed VAE/graph models to reveal joint latent representation of genomic signatures across all diseases and phenotypes.

Title: NLP
Description: Created a suite of proprietary Python packages for advanced topic modelling of the PubMed literature to provide business intelligence to the world’s largest digital health, biotech, and pharma companies (as a consultant with [120/80 Group](https://www.12080group.com/)).

Title: Tensor decomposition
Description: Applied multi-condition factorisation to efficiently discover neurodegeneration-relevant *trans*-eQTLs [ @[file-text] ](https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pgen.1008549)
